query:
SELECT 
  r.id, 
  r.customerId, 
  r.amount, 
  r.status, 
  r.transactionId,
  r.createdAt,
  r.completedAt,
  p.txid,
  p.status as pixStatus
FROM recharges r
LEFT JOIN pix_transactions p ON r.transactionId = p.txid
WHERE r.customerId = 480001 AND r.amount = 120
ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC
